text: Zisas Garirin vergap kav, mba tugivigen ana won ŋaara bakɨme khavgia ana mbuav, Fhe Bakɨmen buni vhuuiŋ bun gumgi gu mbigi ga nzuai. Ana Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuiŋ bun nzuav, khaŋ mbe nzuai, “Nde wari wo ndavi domdorɨri. Ne khaŋ muuŋgi, Fhe Bakɨme wo gumgi gu mbigi ganɨnga, mbe ana piin kɨrga tuk han mbarigi.”
